> Available commands:
> help - print this message
> suggest [parameters] - select a planet to visit
> visit [parameters] - select a planet to vist and go there
> If you do not specify parameters, the script will use current settings to control selection
> Available parameters:
> coordinates XXXXXXX - go to the coordinates you specified
> random [difficulty] - go to a random planet, as restrained by the difficulty you chose
> unvisited [goals] [difficulty] - go to a random previously unvisited planet, as restrained by the goals and difficulty you chose
> validated [goals] [difficulty] - go to a random previously visited planet, as restrained by the goals and difficulty you chose
> known [goals] [difficulty] - go to a random known planet, as restrained by the goals and difficulty you chose
> goal A [, B]... [difficulty] - go to the hardest known planet that satisfies all the goals you selected
> Difficulty is always optional; if not selected, script settings will determine it. It defauls to (A-Z)
> (X) - difficulty is exactly X
> (X-Y) - difficulty is between X and Y, inclusive
> Available goals:
> rocks - If this is the only goal, will find a planet with all rocks.
> rocks{0-7} - 0-7 to specifies types of rocks desired.
> plants - Hostile anomalous plants.
> animals - Hostile anomalousanimals.
> TYPE plants - Hostile plants: primitive (or simple), advanced (or complex), anomalous (or exotic).
> TYPE animals - Hostile animals: primitive (or simple), advanced (or complex), anomalous (or exotic).
> trade [buy] [ITEM] - friendly aliens selling the (optiona) item. Will find cheapest, if you want to 'buy'
> (ITEM is one of salad, booze, medicine, mask)
> trophy [ITEM] - hostile aliens wielding the (optional) equipment
> (ITEM is one of blowgun, loincloth, necklace, spear, totem)
> murderbots [TYPE] - Murderbots (optionally) with artifact, drones, or soldiers
> spants [TYPE] - Spants (optionally) with artifact, drones, or soldiers
> ruins - any ruins
> detected [TYPE] - Detected but unidentified (trade, murderbots, spants, ruins
> procrastinator [STEP] - the next (or specified: 1, 2, or 3) step in the Procrastinator quest
> space baby [STEP] - the next (or specified: 1, 2, or 3) step in the Space Baby quest
> space pirate [STEP] - the next (or specified: 1, 2, or 3) step in the Space Pirate quest
> For spants and murderbots, [TYPE] is optional. If omitted, chooses any planet with specified army'.
> For aliens, [ITEM] is optional. If omitted, chooses any planet with friendly aliens
> Available script settings:
> VSG.Coordinates - coordinates or RANDOM or KNOWN or UNVISITED or VALIDATED
> VSG.Goals - set of goals. Default is 'rocks'
> VSG.BuyTradeItem - true or false
> VSG.BoozeMaximumPrice - Maximum price to spend for primitive alien booze. Default is 1000000. 0 to not buy
> VSG.MaskMaximumPrice - Maximum price to spend for primitive alien mask. Default is 1000000. 0 to not buy
> VSG.MedicineMaximumPrice - Maximum price to spend for primitive alien medicine. Default is 1000000. 0 to not buy
> VSG.SaladMaximumPrice - Maximum price to spend for primitive alien salad. Default is 1000000. 0 to not buy
> VSG.MinimumDifficulty - Easiest planet to visit. Default is A
> VSG.MaximumDifficulty - Hardest planet to visit. Default is Z
> VSG.MinimumProcrastinatorLanguage - Minimum language fluency to try for step 2. Default is 60
> VSG.MinimumSpaceBabyLanguage -  Minimum language fluency to try for step 2. Default is 50
> VSG.MinimumSpacePirateLanguage - Minimum language fluency to try for step 2. Default is 40
> VSG.Strategy - 'research' (default) (at expense of turns) or 'turns' (at expense of research)
> VSG.SampleKit - none, geological sample kit (default), botanical sample kit, zoological sample kit
> VSG.ExtraMaximizerParameters - anything you want. Be careful not to preclude required hazard mitigation gear!
> VSG.TurnInResearch - turn in research at end. Default is true
> VSG.AlienGemstoneHandling - special handling for alien gemstones. none (default), closet, mallsell

mall.php?didadv=0&pudnuggler=primitive+alien&category=allitems&food_sortitemsby=name&booze_sortitemsby=name&othercon_sortitemsby=name&consumable_byme=0&hats_sortitemsby=name&shirts_sortitemsby=name&pants_sortitemsby=name&weapons_sortitemsby=name&weaponattribute=3&weaponhands=3&acc_sortitemsby=name&offhand_sortitemsby=name&wearable_byme=0&famequip_sortitemsby=name&nolimits=0&justitems=0&sortresultsby=price&max_price=0&x_cheapest=0&consumable_tier_1=0&consumable_tier_2=0&consumable_tier_3=0&consumable_tier_4=0&consumable_tier_5=0
> Validating configuration.
> VMF.FamiliarEquipment: 'ittah bittah hookah' may not be the best item for your Trick-or-Treating Tot; ignoring.
> All is well!

You gain 152 Beefiness
You gain 173 Mysteriousness
You gain a Mysticality point!
You gain 160 Chutzpah
You gain 1,702 Meat

[792] Barf Mountain
Encounter: garbage tourist
Round 0: dextrial wins initiative!
Round 1: You lose 1 hit point
Round 1: dextrial casts SING ALONG!
Round 2: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 2: dextrial casts SAUCY SALVE!
Round 2: You gain 10 hit points
Round 2: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 2: dextrial casts SAUCY SALVE!
Round 2: You gain 22 hit points
Round 2: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 2: dextrial casts SAUCY SALVE!
Round 3: You gain 10 hit points
Round 3: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 3: dextrial casts SAUCY SALVE!
Round 3: You gain 12 hit points
Round 3: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 3: dextrial casts SAUCEGEYSER!
Round 4: garbage tourist takes 1394 damage.
Round 4: - jumps out of the Buddy Bjorn and flies at your opponent's face, quacking and pecking. Your foe does about 42 to herself from flailing around in a panic.
Round 4: dextrial wins the fight!
After Battle: - surveys the scene from your back, and gains 1 Experience.
After Battle: CeeCee dances around the corpse, shouting "Take that, mean ol' monster!" and then searches their pockets for candy. She's gonna be a damn fine adventurer one day.
After Battle: You gain 52 hit points
After Battle: You gain 40 Mana Points
You gain 3801 Meat
After Battle: Jankjenk pirouettes in the air, searching for scattered items. Maybe he was a pierougi in a past life.
You acquire an item: bag of park garbage
You acquire an item: bag of park garbage
You acquire an item: normal barrel
After Battle: You gain 14 Strengthliness
After Battle: You gain 20 Magicalness
After Battle: You gain 11 Roguishness
You acquire an item: Pok&eacute;-Gro fertilizer

[1003] The Nemesis' Lair
Encounter: the Spaghetti Elemental WITH BACON!!!
Round 0: dextrial wins initiative!
Round 1: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 1: dextrial casts SING ALONG!
Round 2: dextrial casts POCKET CRUMBS!
Round 3: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) drops 21 attack power.
Round 3: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) drops 19 defense.
Round 3: dextrial uses the Time-Spinner!
Round 4: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) drops 8 attack power.
Round 4: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) drops 7 defense.
Round 4: dextrial casts MICROMETEORITE!
Round 5: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) drops 17 attack power.
Round 5: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) drops 16 defense.
Round 5: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 5: dextrial casts SAUCEGEYSER!
Round 6: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) takes 235 damage.
Round 6: You lose 6 hit points
Round 6: dextrial casts SAUCEGEYSER!
Round 7: Spaghetti Elemental (Volcanic Cave) takes 234 damage.
Round 7: dextrial wins the fight!
You gain 139 Meat
After Battle: Bookface, dressed as Prince George, demands that servants bring him some additional items. (+15% Item Drops)
After Battle: Bookface starts twerking. Is... is that a thing a gnat can do? I guess if a gnat has legs it must also have a butt.
After Battle: Your lucky gold ring gets warmer for a moment. You look down and find a Rubee&trade;!
You acquire an item: Rubee&trade;
You acquire an item: BACON (5)
After Battle: You gain 14 Muscleboundness
After Battle: You gain 32 Magicalness
After Battle: You gain 15 Cheek
